title: Rank Rewards
body: In the previous season, being season 6, I got to silver 1 and ended silver 2.  I did not get the rewards that I should have. I did not receive the Silver Summoner Icon or the Silver border.

replies.body: Season rewards have finished being sent out now.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll look into your specific issue to see what's up.  We'll reply back as soon as we can.
